downloadTitle: Understanding and Evaluating Virtual Smart Cards
downloadDescription: Provides an overview of TPM virtual smart cards as an option for strong authentication.

downloadFile.name: Understanding and Evaluating Virtual Smart Cards.docx

detailsSection: This document presents an overview of TPM virtual smart cards as an option for strong authentication.  It provides a means for evaluating virtual smart card use in an enterprise deployment, in addition to providing information necessary for deploying and managing virtual smart cards.
detailsSection_file_name: Understanding and Evaluating Virtual Smart Cards.docx
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
